00063 namespace OpenSim { 
00064 
00065 class OSIMCOMMON_API XYPoint
00066 {
00067 public:
00068     double _x;
00069     double _y;
00070     XYPoint() { _x = _y = 0.0; }
00071     XYPoint(double aX, double aY) { _x = aX; _y = aY; }
00072 
00073 #ifndef SWIG
00074     bool operator==(const XYPoint &aXYPoint) const { return false; }
00075     bool operator<(const XYPoint &aXYPoint) const { return false; }
00076 #endif
00077 
00078 };
